open.title: Evotel outage | Northriding
open.description: Evotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Northriding, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Evotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Frogfoot| Constantia Place
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Constantia Place , affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
-- Vendor techs are on site. Access arrangements are taking place
-- Techs tested from Bredell and received a disconnection at 4.308km. The link full distance is 5.056km
-- Techs are localizing the link. More updates to follow
-- Links are still testing down. Vendor techs have been informed to investigate further
Frogfoot engineers are still working on restoring services. No ETA has been provided as yet. We apologise for the inconvenience.

open.title: TT Connect maintenance
open.description: TT Connect is conducting maintenance on their network on the 11th of April from 23:00 the the 12th of April at 02:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Maintenance | Vorna Valley
open.description: Vumatel is conducting maintenance in Vorna Valley from 08/04/2024 to 12/04/2024 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Frogfoot Outage | Cape Town & Port Elizabeth
closed.description: We are investigating reports of high latency and packloss affecting clients on the Frogfoot network in Cape Town & Port Elizabeth. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
closed.resolution: Afrihost network team is engaging with our upstream provider to investigate further. Engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
